attributes.action: Petition for all self employed people in the UK to to get Statutory Sick pay.
attributes.background: To give the same rights and access to SSP from day one of an illness   Clarified by there own GP. Same as an employed worker. And to raise the weekly equivalent to governments living wage of £8.72 per hour as of April 2020 Based on a 40hr week and taking into account a claimants age.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300336
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302277

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
